bug.description:
Describe the bug I am trying to use Ray Perception Sensor 2D. It doesn't look like the gizmo to draw debug information is working properly. Please see screenshot. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/509887/84583823-407b2500-adcb-11ea-9dc4-b4addf74f5de.png></denchmark-link>
The sphere is visible and changes size, but it's always on top of the agent. The 3D version seems to work correctly and shows the rays. The 2D version is always red (hit) and always on top of the agent (I never see the rays). To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: Console logs / stack traces n/a Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information): Unity: 2019.4.0f1 Version information: ml-agents: 0.16.0, ml-agents-envs: 0.16.0, Communicator API: 1.0.0, TensorFlow: 2.2.0

comments.comment: Nevermind, I misunderstood the interaction with colliders.
